mapper.select: select wi.wishid, wi.custid, wi.itemid, wi.wishdate, it.itemname, it.itemimg from wish wi INNER JOIN item it ON wi.itemid = it.itemid INNER JOIN customer cu ON wi.custid = cu.custid WHERE wishid=#{wishid}

mapper.update: UPDATE wish SET itemid=#{itemid}, custid=#{custid}, wishdate=sysdate() WHERE wishid=#{wishid}
